channel.title: How to make a ::pvp command?
channel.description: How can i make a ::pvp command so my players can get to pvping easier?? please help

item.title: How to make a ::pvp command?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[size=14pt]ASSUMING IT’S DELTA 317:[/size]

If you don’t want them to be able to teleport while in combat:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pvp")) { if(!inCombat) { triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0); } else { sM("You can't teleport in combat!"); } }

Or if you want them to be able to teleport while in combat:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pvp")) { triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0); }

Change the XXXX to the X coordinate.
Change the YYYY to the Y coordinate.

Read full topic
